comment: тут катсценка на зеленый обелиск некронов, типо ксенотехнология доставания чего-то из карманного измерения, на фэйле нужен вот такой барк

languages.text: Стоит вам коснуться обелиска, как бессвязные потоки ксеноинформации заполняют ваше сознание, вызывая липкую тошноту.

traits.locale_text: Стоит вам коснуться обелиска, как бессвязные потоки ксеноинформации заполняют ваше сознание, вызывая липкую тошноту.

languages.text: As soon as you touch the obelisk, disjointed streams of alien information flood your mind, making you nauseous.
languages.original_text: Стоит вам коснуться обелиска, как бессвязные потоки ксеноинформации заполняют ваше сознание, вызывая липкую тошноту.

traits.locale_text: As soon as you touch the obelisk, disjointed streams of alien information flood your mind, making you nauseous.
As soon as you touch the obelisk, disjointed streams of alien information flood your mind, making you nauseous.
As soon as you touch the obelisk, disjointed streams of alien information flood your mind, making you nauseous.
As soon as you touch the obelisk, disjointed streams of alien information flood your mind, making you nauseous.
As soon as you touch the obelisk, disjointed streams of alien information flood your mind, making you nauseous.

languages.text: 当你刚刚触碰到方尖碑时，各种杂乱无章的异形信息流就涌入了你的脑海，让你几欲作呕。
languages.original_text: As soon as you touch the obelisk, disjointed streams of alien information flood your mind, making you nauseous.

traits.locale_text: 当你刚刚触碰到方尖碑时，各种杂乱无章的异形信息流就涌入了你的脑海，让你几欲作呕。

languages.text: Kaum berührst du den Obelisken, fluten verzerrte Ströme fremder Informationen deinen Verstand, so dass du dir übel wird.
languages.original_text: As soon as you touch the obelisk, disjointed streams of alien information flood your mind, making you nauseous.

traits.locale_text: Kaum berührst du den Obelisken, fluten verzerrte Ströme fremder Informationen deinen Verstand, so dass du dir übel wird.

languages.text: Au moment où vous touchez l'obélisque, un torrent de flux d'informations incohérents envahit votre esprit jusqu'à vous donner la nausée.
languages.original_text: As soon as you touch the obelisk, disjointed streams of alien information flood your mind, making you nauseous.

traits.locale_text: Au moment où vous touchez l'obélisque, un torrent de flux d'informations incohérents envahit votre esprit jusqu'à vous donner la nausée.

languages.text: En cuanto tocas el obelisco, varios torrentes inconexos de información alienígena inundan tu mente, provocándote náuseas.
languages.original_text: As soon as you touch the obelisk, disjointed streams of alien information flood your mind, making you nauseous.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto tocas el obelisco, varios torrentes inconexos de información alienígena inundan tu mente, provocándote náuseas.

languages.text: オベリスクに触れたとたん、頭の中に異星人の情報が次々と流れ込み、吐き気を催した。
languages.original_text: As soon as you touch the obelisk, disjointed streams of alien information flood your mind, making you nauseous.

traits.locale_text: オベリスクに触れたとたん、頭の中に異星人の情報が次々と流れ込み、吐き気を催した。

languages.text: Dikili taşa dokunduğun anda karmaşık uzaylı bilgileri, zihnine akarak mideni bulandırıyor.
languages.original_text: As soon as you touch the obelisk, disjointed streams of alien information flood your mind, making you nauseous.
